K10D0170_H0171:490a-1: a'arya shr'i ma t'i brahma n'i pa ri pritstsh'a n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-3: 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0170_H0171:490a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-7: bcom ldan 'das w'a ra na s'i na drang srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi nags na /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-8: dge slong bdun brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10D0170_H0171:490a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-11: sham thabs mnabs te lhung bzed bsnams nas /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-12: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:490a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham
K10D0170_H0171:490a-14: pa dang thabs gcig tu grong khyer w'a ra na
K10D0170_H0171:490b-0: s'ir bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs @490b so; ;de nas
K10D0170_H0171:490b-1: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer w'a ra na sir mthar
K10D0170_H0171:490b-2: chags su bsod snyoms mdzad cing /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-3: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-4: bsod snyoms kyi phyir phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-5: bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-9: dul pa dang zhi gnas kyi pha rol tu son pa /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-10: zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-16: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-17: mtsho ltar dvangs zhing gsal la rnyogs pa med pa; gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-24: lhang nge zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po de nyid nas mthong ngo //
K10D0170_H0171:490b-25: mthong nas kyang sems dang par gyur te /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-26: de sems dang bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-29: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10D0170_H0171:490b-30: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0170_H0171:490b-34: gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @491a *//
K10D0170_H0171:491a-1: chen po ma pham pa so so ci rigs par bzhugs so //
K10D0170_H0171:491a-2: de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa bde bar bzhugs pa rig nas /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0170_H0171:491a-6: bcom ldan 'das; grong khyer w'a ra na s'ir drang
K10D0170_H0171:491a-7: srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi nags 'dir bcom ldan
K10D0170_H0171:491a-8: 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes bdag
K10D0170_H0171:491a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bskor ba'i chos ji lta bu zhig lags /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0170_H0171:491a-13: dpal ldan ma; ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-14: 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-15: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-18: gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-19: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-20: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-21: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-22: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-23: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-24: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K10D0170_H0171:491a-25: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-0: de ltar sdug @491b bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0170_H0171:491b-2: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-3: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-6: gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag ;skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-12: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-18: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'
K10D0170_H0171:491b-19: zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya
K10D0170_H0171:491b-26: sus kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma
K10D0170_H0171:491b-27: bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di grong khyer w'a
K10D0170_H0171:491b-28: ra na s'ir drang srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi
K10D0170_H0171:491b-29: nags su de bzhin gshegs pas bskor to //
K10D0170_H0171:491b-30: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-31: bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0170_H0171:491b-33: ci ma rig pa nang na mchis sam /
K10D0170_H0171:491b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-3: gal te ma rig pa nang dang /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-4: slad rol na ma mchis pa lags na ma mchis
K10D0170_H0171:492a-5: pa de ji ltar 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen du
K10D0170_H0171:492a-7: chos gang yang 'jig rten pha rol na mchis lags sam /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-13: ma rig pa'i rnam pa mchis lags sam /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-18: ma rig pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
K10D0170_H0171:492a-19: rnam par 'byung gi yang dag pa'i rnam par ni
K10D0170_H0171:492a-21: ma rig pa ni phyin ci log gi rnam par 'byung gi /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-22: phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo //
K10D0170_H0171:492a-25: ma rig pa ma mchis na /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-31: zhugs shing n+ya gro dha'i rtsa ba ma mchis na de'i yal ga dang /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-33: yal ga phre'u ji ltar mngon par 'gyur /
K10D0170_H0171:492a-34: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa ma
K10D0170_H0171:492a-35: byung zhing mchis pa ma lags na 'du byed rnams
K10D0170_H0171:492a-36: kyi rkyen kyang lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur
K10D0170_H0171:492a-37: // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-0: rang gi mtshan nyid @492b gyis chos thams cad stong
K10D0170_H0171:492b-1: na byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang
K10D0170_H0171:492b-2: mi ldan pa / mi shes pa /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-3: ma rtogs pa dag las mngon par 'du byed de /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-4: las rnams yod pas srid pa mngon par 'grub par
K10D0170_H0171:492b-5: byed do; ;srid pa yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar
K10D0170_H0171:492b-6: zad de / 'di la las mngon par 'du byed
K10D0170_H0171:492b-7: pa'ang su'ang med cing srid pa ma len par 'grub
K10D0170_H0171:492b-9: de ni chos rnams kyi don dam pa'o //
K10D0170_H0171:492b-11: 'on kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa
K10D0170_H0171:492b-12: rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas tha snyad nye bar bzung
K10D0170_H0171:492b-13: ste / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0170_H0171:492b-14: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can rnams
K10D0170_H0171:492b-17: tha snyad ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-19: de la khong du chud par byed pa po'ang med /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-20: de la shes par byed pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0170_H0171:492b-24: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul te /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-25: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa des kyang sprul pa
K10D0170_H0171:492b-26: gzhan sprul na de la de bzhin gshegs pas sprul
K10D0170_H0171:492b-27: pa'ang gsog ste rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no
K10D0170_H0171:492b-28: // sprul pas sprul pa gang yin pa de'ang gsog ste /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-29: rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10D0170_H0171:492b-31: de bzhin du gang gis chos mngon par 'du bya ba byas pa de'ang gsog ste /
K10D0170_H0171:492b-32: rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10D0170_H0171:492b-33: chos gang mngon par 'du bya ba de'ang gsog ste /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-0: @493a *// rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10D0170_H0171:493a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-7: bskor ba ma lags pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-8: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-9: ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-10: skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-11: dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-12: mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo 'di bskor ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo 'di bskor lags so //
K10D0170_H0171:493a-13: de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas tsandan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-18: stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo nas /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-19: mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du chos
K10D0170_H0171:493a-20: kyi 'khor lo 'di lta bu bskor bar gyur cig
K10D0170_H0171:493a-21: ces smras so // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10D0170_H0171:493a-22: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K10D0170_H0171:493a-23: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom
K10D0170_H0171:493a-24: ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha
K10D0170_H0171:493a-25: dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs /
K10D0170_H0171:493b-4: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de
K10D0170_H0171:493b-5: dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med
K10D0170_H0171:493b-6: pa dag snang bas khyab par byas te /
K10D0170_H0171:493b-7: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung
K10D0170_H0171:493b-8: nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
K10D0170_H0171:493b-9: bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
K10D0170_H0171:493b-10: tu nub bo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0170_H0171:493b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham
K10D0170_H0171:493b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0170_H0171:493b-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen
K10D0170_H0171:493b-16: ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa
K10D0170_H0171:493b-19: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:493b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K10D0170_H0171:493b-21: chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka'
K10D0170_H0171:493b-23: khyod kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'dis tsandan gyi phye ma sbar gang blangs te /
K10D0170_H0171:493b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtor ba mthong ngam /
K10D0170_H0171:493b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0170_H0171:493b-32: bram ze mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal
K10D0170_H0171:493b-33: pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir ngan 'gro
K10D0170_H0171:493b-34: log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0170_H0171:494a-1: bzhi stong la bsti stang byed par 'gyur /
K10D0170_H0171:494a-5: de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur /
K10D0170_H0171:494a-7: dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10D0170_H0171:494a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am /
K10D0170_H0171:494a-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la'ang mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur /
K10D0170_H0171:494a-10: sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la 'god par 'gyur ro //
K10D0170_H0171:494a-11: de'i phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su bdag snang
K10D0170_H0171:494a-12: ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la stong gsum gyi
K10D0170_H0171:494a-13: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du
K10D0170_H0171:494a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0170_H0171:494a-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya ba
K10D0170_H0171:494a-17: de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong tshang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0170_H0171:494a-18: de sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
K10D0170_H0171:494a-19: gi don byas nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
K10D0170_H0171:494a-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
K10D0170_H0171:494a-22: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:494a-23: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K10D0170_H0171:494a-24: chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to
K10D0170_H0171:494a-25: // bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-3: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma bla na med pa
K10D0170_H0171:494b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod
K10D0170_H0171:494b-5: pas sngon bud med kyi lus nyid la gnas nas
K10D0170_H0171:494b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi sku la
K10D0170_H0171:494b-7: me tog gi phreng ba gsol to //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi sku la'ang chos gos gsol te /
K10D0170_H0171:494b-9: de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas lo stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-10: bcom ldan 'das de la zab mo'i gnas rnams kyang zhus so //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi
K10D0170_H0171:494b-12: dge 'dun dang bcas pa la'ang zhal zas kyis tshim
K10D0170_H0171:494b-13: par byas so // bstabs par yang byas so //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la'ang aa ti mug ta ka'i me tog dag gis gtor nas /
K10D0170_H0171:494b-15: bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag blangs so //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la'ang ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du na bza' dang /
K10D0170_H0171:494b-20: yo byad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer te /
K10D0170_H0171:494b-21: bcom ldan 'das des zla ba gnyis bshos gsol to //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-22: chag zung gcig kyang phul lo //
K10D0170_H0171:494b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0170_H0171:494b-24: chub 'di nyid 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
K10D0170_H0171:494b-25: srung la gser gyi phreng bas gtor te /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-0: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma @495a *//
K10D0170_H0171:495a-1: gyur kyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po las ma gyur cig ces smras te /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-3: 'di'ang bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-6: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma dang /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-10: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0170_H0171:495a-12: 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa
K10D0170_H0171:495a-13: zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
K10D0170_H0171:495a-14: //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
K10D0170_H0171:495a-16: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande ye shes sde
